name: Spiritual Trip to Lumbini - Birthplace of Lord Buddha
description: This is the trip to the birth place of Lord Buddha, which is one of the important religious place for Buddhists. We visit the Mayadevi temple, various monasteries and the remains of the palace of prince Siddhartha (later lord Buddha). Ramgram stupa, the only relic stupa in the world with the ashes of lord Buddha.
